environment.PBS_NODEFILE: Used to identify the allocated nodes
environment.PBS_O_WORKDIR: The working directory for the job

script_arguments.tagid: A variable passed to the MATLAB script

matlab_arguments.-nodisplay: Runs MATLAB without a graphical user interface
matlab_arguments.-nodesktop: Runs MATLAB without the desktop environment
matlab_arguments.-r: Executes a MATLAB command or script
